cause.description:
We, the elite, are on a quest. A quest FOR PANTS. Capris are girly and make Nika sick. Shorts cause her legs to become less pale. Pants are the only way for Nika though, regretably, she only have two pair left.
We must rally the masses and get Nika more pants.
1. Nika's legs must not tan.
2. Capris are the devils choice of clothing.
3. Shorts are for people that aren't Nika.
cause.name: Pants for Nika
